Traits.Name: Fortify
Traits.Description:
At the end of their turn, gains vigilance 1. Vigilance charges stack if a character gains more than one. A character can spend a charge of Vigilance for one of the following:
- When an adjacent ally is targeted as part of an ability, shift all damage and effects to you instead of that ally, regardless of range.
- Deal piercing fray damage to any foe that breaks adjacency with you for any reason during their turn.
Lose all vigilance charges at the start of your turn.

Actions.Name: Inspire Dread
Actions.Description: An imperial ally in range 3 immediately recharges an ability.

Actions.Name: Rocket Jump
Actions.Description: The Praetorian flies 4 spaces in a straight line. All adjacent foes when it lands are dazed and shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Arkentech Force Shield
Actions.Description: The Praetorian gains aura 2 until the end of its next turn. The Praetorian and any of its allies have resistance against abilities originating from characters outside the aura.
